cause.description:
In Order to be able to experience life to the full one must acquire a relationship with God, how do we archieve this? By studying his word; the bible, examining and practicing the bible you will find out that the only way to know whats good, whats love, whats knowledge, is by knowing God. All we do as humans is put our securities in things that can be taken away from us, our money, clothes, friends, good looks, friends, Jobs, carrers, health, and even our memory. God is the only thing that has been here since the beggining. Many people say they know love, with out knowing God! God is love, theres no way you can know one without the other. Also, people say they believe in evolution, i believe in evolution, people must get rid of their ignorant mindset, those that oppose the bible withouteven knowing whats in it. The purpose of this cause is to help others have a chance to understand that our battle is not against flesh and blood, but againsts spiritual dark forces.
1. We all need God, he's wisdom, he's love
2. Spiritual health is just as imperative as physical health
3. If you practice it, your life will change, life to the full
cause.mission: Help people get closer to GOD
cause.name: Savin Souls
